channel.title: 🏢 Universitá Degli Studi Di Milano on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Universitá Degli Studi Di Milano on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Fixed Confidence Best Arm Identification in the Bayesian Setting
item.description: Bayesian best-arm identification algorithm achieves near-optimal sample complexity by incorporating an early-stopping criterion.
